name: John F. Kennedy Dr
description: A narrowing stretch of John F. Kennedy Drive, hinting at the edge of town. You are on John F. Kennedy Dr. The street is getting narrower here, a subtle metaphor for the shrinking possibilities of suburban life. John F. Kennedy Dr continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and a few houses that have seen better decades. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird, oblivious to the subtle decay.
